item.title: Four Words and Five Lines
item.description: The four words and five lines that matter in speech-writing. Four Words Brevity - keep it brief Levity - keep it light Charity - keep it purposeful Clarity - keep it clear Five Lines Outline - all the research and material that goes into the speech Headline - the ten words that matter Frontline - go big right from the start Sideline - levity, have some fun Bottom line - why are we here, what do you want me to do Best of luck with the next speech you give.
